directions: Combine the honeydew melon, grape tomatoes, and green bell peppers in a large bowl. Whisk together the vegetable oil, lemon juice, sugar, basil, and pepper in another bowl, and pour over the honeydew mixture. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, up to 48 hours, before serving, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: 3  honeydew melons - peeled, seeded and cubed
4  green bell peppers, seeded and cut into strips
title: Honeydew-Grape Tomato Salad
